Articles.Content:
Hi there,

for realism sake I am looking for some kind of mapping add-on to use, to send a mapping sat to a celestrial body, before sending my kerbals there.

I remember, there was on, but that is no longer supported?!

I am interested in your suggestions!

Thanks!
Definitely SCANSat. There's also ISA MapSat (probably the one you referred to as unsupported), but SCANSat does more and gives me fewer problems.
is it possible to run SCANSAT and Kethane on the same satellite?

is it possible to run SCANSAT and Kethane on the same satellite?

Yes. Just put both parts on.
